bettingsystem.bet.betplaced.message: You already placed a bet of $1 on $2.

bettingsystem.bet.error.max.message: The maximum bet you can place is $1.

bettingsystem.bet.error.min.message: The minimum bet you can place is $1.

bettingsystem.bet.error.points.message: You don't have enough $1 to bet that much.

bettingsystem.bet.null.message: That is not a valid bet option.

bettingsystem.close.error.usage.message: The bet is now closed! Waiting on winning result. Use !bet close [winning option]

bettingsystem.close.semi.success.message: The bet is now closed! Waiting on a winning option.

bettingsystem.close.success.message: Bet is now closed! Winning option is $1! Calculating results and giving points to the winners!

bettingsystem.close.success.winners.message: A total of $1 players won this bet! There was a total of $2 was won for the people who placed a bet on $3!

bettingsystem.gain.set.message: Gain percent has been set to $1%

bettingsystem.global.usage.message: Usage: !bet [open / close / save / saveformat / lookup / results / togglemessages / gain]

bettingsystem.lookup.null.message: No bets were made on that day.

bettingsystem.lookup.usage.message: Usage: !bet lookup [$1] - use _# after the date if you made multiple bets that day.

bettingsystem.open.error.message: You must chose a winning option on the previous bet before you can open a new one. Use !bet close [option]

bettingsystem.open.success.message: A bet is now opened! "$1". Bet options: "$2". Bet with: !bet [amount] [option]

bettingsystem.open.usage.message: Usage: !bet open ["title"] ["option1, option2, etc."] [minimum bet] [maximum bet] [close timer mins] - The quotes are needed for the title and options.

bettingsystem.results.message: Current bet: Title: "$1", Options: "$2", Total Points: $3, Total Entries: $4

bettingsystem.save.format.message: Title: "$1", Options: "$2", Total Points: $3, Total Entries: $4, Points Won: $5.

bettingsystem.saveformat.set.message: Save format has been changed to $1.

bettingsystem.saveformat.usage.message: Usage: !bet saveformat [date format] - Default is yy.M.dd

bettingsystem.toggle.save.message: Betting results will $1 be saved after closing a bet.

bettingsystem.warning.messages.message: Warning messages will $1 be diplayed in chat.
